metadata.name: BITS Transfer Job Download To Potential Suspicious Folder
metadata.comment: Detects new BITS transfer job where the LocalName/Saved file is stored in a potentially suspicious location

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM scheduled_job_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 16403 AND (contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('c:\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('c:\\perflogs\\'))))

output.summary: Detects new BITS transfer job where the LocalName/Saved file is stored in a potentially suspicious location
